briefTitle: Prevention of Neutropenia After Using G-CSF With TAC Chemotherapy
officialTitle: Optimal Timing and Duration of Daily G-CSF With Adjuvant TAC Chemotherapy in Node-positive Breast Cancer;Multicenter, Randomized, Open Label, Clinically IV Phase
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* primary invasive breast carcinoma with lymph node positive with curative surgery with TAC chemotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* pregnancy,
* cardiovascualr disease,
* abnormal renal function,
* hematologic disorder
